data.name: SignInText
data.value: Follow the link and sign in with your Garage Group account

data.name: AuthorizationError
data.value: Failed to authenticate. Please try again later or contact the administrator

data.name: UserNotFound
data.value: User was not found in Dataverse. Please contact the administrator

data.name: UnexpectedError
data.value: An unexpected authorization error occurred. Please contact the administrator

data.name: SignOutSuccess
data.value: You have signed out of your account
